sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
#app.app
  youtube-configurator(:placeholder="'Jotaro'"
                       @onSubmit="onSubmit"
                       :autoPause="autoPause")
  youtube-video(:videoId="hornyBasket"
                @toggle-switch="onToggleSwitch")
</template>

<script>
import YoutubeVideo from './components/YouttubeVideo.vue'
import YoutubeConfigurator from './components/YoutubeConfigurator.vue'
import { videoIdParser } from './utility/parser'
import { validateVideoId } from './utility/validator/youtube-video-validation'
import {YOUTUBE_API_CODES} from './constants/constants'
export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    YoutubeVideo,
    YoutubeConfigurator
  },
  data() {
    return {
      hornyBasket: 'MpGsiRy8jUk',
      autoPause: false
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onSubmit(input) {
      const videoId = videoIdParser(input)
      console.log('videoId: ' + videoId)

      validateVideoId(videoId).then((status) => {
        console.log(status)
        if (status === YOUTUBE_API_CODES.VALID) {
          this.hornyBasket = videoId
        }
      })
    },
    onToggleSwitch(switchValue) {

    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
@import 'src/styles/flex';

body {
  background-image: url('assets/images/pinkStreets.jpg');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  background-position: center;
  background-size: contain;
}

#app {
  overflow-x: hidden;
}
</style>
